  • Method Details

    • optimize

      public void optimize(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, int step)
      Description copied from interface: Optimizer
      Optimizes the given estimation function based on the entire training set and the specified objective function.

      Typical implementations evaluate the ObjectiveFunction across the training set, compute parameterGradients, and update the parameters of the estimation function accordingly.

      Specified by:
      optimize in interface Optimizer<E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number>
      Parameters:
      estimationFunction - the estimation function (model) to optimize
      trainingSet - the dataset used for optimization
      objective - the objective function that defines the loss and parameterGradients

    • getUpdateStep

      public UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N> getUpdateStep()

    • getHyperparameters

      public Map<String,Object> getHyperparameters()
      Description copied from interface: HyperparameterConfigurable
      Returns a snapshot of all current hyperparameters.

      The returned map should contain stable, human-readable keys (such as "learningRate" or "momentum") mapped to their current values. Implementations are encouraged to return a defensive copy so that external modifications do not affect the internal state.

      Specified by:
      getHyperparameters in interface HyperparameterConfigurable
      Returns:
      an immutable or defensive copy of the current hyperparameters

    • setHyperparameter

      public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value)
      Description copied from interface: HyperparameterConfigurable
      Updates a single hyperparameter by name.
      Specified by:
      setHyperparameter in interface HyperparameterConfigurable
      Parameters:
      name - the hyperparameter name
      value - the new hyperparameter value
